short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and block distracting sites, and remove distracting colors from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you want to get rid of distracting, colorful webpages and are spending too much time on nonproductive sites, Mono Focus can help. This browser extension transforms your browsing experience by converting all websites to black and white and allows you to track and block distracting sites effectively.
